verses.text: \add Set\add* the \w trumpet|strong="H7782"\w* to thy \w mouth|strong="H2441"\w*. \add He shall come\add* as an \w eagle|strong="H5404"\w* against the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, because they have \w transgressed|strong="H5674"\w* my \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*, and \w trespassed|strong="H6586"\w* against my \w law|strong="H8451"\w*.\f + \fr 8.1 \ft thy: Heb. the roof of thy\f*
\w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* shall \w cry|strong="H2199"\w* unto me, My \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, we \w know|strong="H3045"\w* thee.
\w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* hath cast \w off|strong="H2186"\w* \add the thing that is\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*: the \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w* shall \w pursue|strong="H7291"\w* him.

They have set up \w kings|strong="H4427"\w*, but not by me: they have made \w princes|strong="H7786"\w*, and I \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* \add it\add* not: of their \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* and their \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* have they \w made|strong="H6213"\w* them \w idols|strong="H6091"\w*, that they may be cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w*.

¶ Thy \w calf|strong="H5695"\w*, O \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*, hath \w cast|strong="H2186"\w* \add thee\add* off; mine \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* is \w kindled|strong="H2734"\w* against them: how long \add will it be\add* \w ere|strong="H3808"\w* they \w attain|strong="H3201"\w* to \w innocency|strong="H5356"\w*?

For from \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \add was\add* it also: the \w workman|strong="H2796"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* it; therefore it \add is\add* not \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: but the \w calf|strong="H5695"\w* of \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w* shall be broken in \w pieces|strong="H7616"\w*.

For they have \w sown|strong="H2232"\w* the \w wind|strong="H7307"\w*, and they shall \w reap|strong="H7114"\w* the \w whirlwind|strong="H5492"\w*: it hath no \w stalk|strong="H7054"\w*: the \w bud|strong="H6780"\w* shall \w yield|strong="H6213"\w* no \w meal|strong="H7058"\w*: \w if|strong="H0194"\w* so be it \w yield|strong="H6213"\w*, the \w strangers|strong="H2114"\w* shall swallow it \w up|strong="H1104"\w*.\f + \fr 8.7 \ft stalk: or, standing corn\f*

\w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* is swallowed \w up|strong="H1104"\w*: now shall they be among the \w Gentiles|strong="H1471"\w* as a \w vessel|strong="H3627"\w* wherein \add is\add* no \w pleasure|strong="H2656"\w*.

For they are gone \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w*, a wild \w ass|strong="H6501"\w* \w alone|strong="H0909"\w* by himself: \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* hath \w hired|strong="H8566"\w* \w lovers|strong="H0158"\w*.\f + \fr 8.9 \ft lovers: Heb. loves\f*

Yea, though they have \w hired|strong="H8566"\w* among the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, now will I \w gather|strong="H6908"\w* them, and they shall \w sorrow|strong="H2490"\w* a \w little|strong="H4592"\w* for the \w burden|strong="H4853"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*.\f + \fr 8.10 \ft sorrow: or, begin\f*\f + \fr 8.10 \ft a…: or, in a little while\f*

Because \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* hath made \w many|strong="H7235"\w* \w altars|strong="H4196"\w* to \w sin|strong="H2398"\w*, \w altars|strong="H4196"\w* shall be unto him to \w sin|strong="H2398"\w*.

I have \w written|strong="H3789"\w* to him the great \w things|strong="H7230"\w* of my \w law|strong="H8451"\w*, \add but\add* they were \w counted|strong="H2803"\w* as a strange \w thing|strong="H2114"\w*.

They \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \add for\add* the \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w* of mine \w offerings|strong="H1890"\w*, and \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \add it; but\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w accepteth|strong="H7521"\w* them not; now will he \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* their \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*, and \w visit|strong="H6485"\w* their \w sins|strong="H2403"\w*: they shall \w return|strong="H7725"\w* to \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.\f + \fr 8.13 \ft They sacrifice…: or, In the sacrifices of mine offerings they, etc\f*

For \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* hath \w forgotten|strong="H7911"\w* his \w Maker|strong="H6213"\w*, and \w buildeth|strong="H1129"\w* \w temples|strong="H1964"\w*; and \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* hath \w multiplied|strong="H7235"\w* \w fenced|strong="H1219"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*: but I will \w send|strong="H7971"\w* a \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* upon his \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, and it shall \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* the \w palaces|strong="H0759"\w* thereof.
